short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip to a specific timestamp in a YouTube video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouSkip: Effortless Video Skipping

Tired of manually scrubbing through YouTube videos to find that perfect moment? YouSkip is here to make your video-watching experience seamless and efficient. With YouSkip, you can instantly jump to any point in a video with just a few clicks or keystrokes.

Features:

Instant Time Jump: Enter a time in the format 1h2m3s (or just 2m40s for shorter durations) and hit the "Skip To Time" button to jump straight to that point in the video.
Keyboard Shortcut: Press Enter to quickly submit your time input, making it even easier to navigate videos.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design to ensure you can jump to any time with minimal effort.
How It Works:

Enter the desired time in the input field (e.g., 1h30m15s for 1 hour, 30 minutes, and 15 seconds).
Click the "Skip To Time" button or press Enter.
Watch as the video seamlessly skips to your specified time.
Note: YouSkip currently supports YouTube videos. For the best experience, ensure you're using YouTube in the Chrome browser.

Upgrade your video navigation with YouSkip and enjoy a smoother, more controlled video-watching experience!
